item.description:
Since the Puggies LOVED the pool for the July Meetup, I thought we'd do it again for August. Why not give them one last pool party before the fall weather sets in. I hope we see a lot more of you too!!

As usual, it'll be from 11am - 1pm and we will need to see updated vaccines for rabies, distemper and canine cough for those who are first time attendees.

If anyone would like to schedule a bath after the pool party, please let me know - we'd be happy to do so.

As always, if you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact me directly.

Agni
item.name: August Meet Up
